example.text: The State of the Union Address will highlight the achievements that House Democrats and President Biden have delivered over the past two years and the work that Democrats are doing to safeguard American values from extreme Republicans. ###

News from Representative Lauren Underwood March 27, 2023 Dear Neighbor, I've been traveling all over the 14th District this month, and every day I've been reminded why I love to call our northern Illinois community home. I'm meeting with elected officials and local leaders from Montgomery to Marseilles to discuss how we can work together to address our most important priorities.

I spoke on the House floor about the urgent need to pass this legislation to save moms' lives: Moms can't wait, and Congress must pass the Momnibus as soon as possible. Thank you, Washington, DC Office 1130 Longworth HOB Washington, DC 20515 Phone: (202) 225-2976 West Chicago Office 490 East Roosevelt Rd., Suite 202 West Chicago, IL 60185 Phone: (630) 549-2190 | Privacy Open in browser window Open plain text version
